topics.body:
You know what I fucking hate?
People calling me a hipster because I'm wearing a beanie in the summer.
Holy shit, I can't choose to wear a hat because I _fucking like it?_ Do I have to have some fucking hipster agenda because I wear a Goddamn _hat?_
It honestly feels so much better for my parents to tell me to take it off because I look like a punk, because that's at least sorta who I am. I like to think I'm kinda punk.
topics.author: 5201b5c0a4c72d0d9b0001e4
